mapper.select: SELECT MATCH_CODE , MATCH_LOCATION , MATCH_DATE , MATCH_START_TIME , MATCH_END_TIME , MATCH_APPLYNUM , MATCH_WRITER , TO_CHAR(MATCH_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MATCH_REGDATE , MATCH_POSSIBLE FROM MATCH ORDER BY MATCH_CODE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MATCH SET MATCH_APPLYNUM = MATCH_APPLYNUM + 1 WHERE MATCH_CODE = #{matchCode}
mapper.select: SELECT MATCH_MANAGE_CODE , MATCH_CODE , TEAM_CODE_AWAY , TEAM_NAME , MATCH_MANAGE_RESPONSE FROM MATCH_MANAGE M, TEAM T WHERE M.TEAM_CODE_AWAY = T.TEAM_CODE AND MATCH_CODE = #{matchCode}
